# Exercises for the R-Beginner - The fancy calculator

## Exercise 2
* from https://alexd106.github.io/intro2R/exercise_2.html
```{r myN, echo=TRUE, include=TRUE}
myNumber <- 12.43

# do some calculations
# natural log
log(myNumber)
```

```{r lg10, echo=TRUE, include=TRUE}
# log10
log10(myNumber)
```

```{r lg10, echo=TRUE, include=TRUE}
# log10
log2(myNumber)
```
```{r myN, echo=TRUE, include=TRUE}
# squareroot
sqrt(myNumber)
```
```{r myN, echo=TRUE, include=TRUE}
#natural antilog 
exp(myNumber)
```
